titles.title: To amend title 44, United States Code, to prohibit the Archivist from charging certain fees to veterans for destroyed records regarding such veterans, and for other purposes.
To amend title 44, United States Code, to prohibit the Archivist from charging certain fees to veterans for destroyed records regarding such veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the National Archives and Records Administration from charging fees to veterans who request certain destroyed records regarding veterans.
